name: Holistis
tag_list: e-merchandising, conversion-rate, personnalization, testing, ab, mvt, content-optimisation, sales-conversion
overview:
Holistis is an e-merchandising solution that combines the power of content testing (A/B & MVT) with content personnalisation in real time in order to increase visitors engagement and in fine, sales conversion.

Holistis offers marketers a Software As A Service to optimize their website content in a simple way. With Holistis, Marketers can implement A/B and Multivariate tests in minutes and personnalize their website content based on their visitors behaviors and environment. Holistis works on all content types: text, image, video, forms…. On average 98% of e-retailer visitors leave the website without making a purchase. This is what we want to change with Holistis.
